__prompts__.project_name: Enter the project name (should be your repository name)
__prompts__.module_name: Enter the module name you want to use in your project (can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores). MUST NOT be the same as your repo name. Example : summit.
__prompts__.developer_redhat_username: Enter your Red Hat Developer username (to push images to your Quay.io account and configure OpenShift access to deploy mlflow)
__prompts__.author: Enter the author name
